Title: Mary's Buttons
Writer: Charlene Govaere (screenplay), Charlene Govaere (story), Charlene Govaere, Charlene M. Govaere, Ray Govaere (screenplay), Ray Govaere (story), Ray Govaere, Joel Paul Reisig (screenplay)
Actors: Jordon Hodges, Rick Bobier, Sharron Nelson, Kirstie Munoz
Plot: In 1910, a prejudice community in outer Detroit attempt to put local immigrants to death for the murder of the town's Sheriff. Based on a true story.
